newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Cosmos Machinery in talks to buy assets.
newsitem.headline: Cosmos Machinery in talks to buy assets.

text.p: Machinery distributor Cosmos Machinery Enterprises Ltd said on Tuesday it was in talks to buy assets from its parent.

"The company is currently in discussions with parties, one of which is the controlling shareholder of the company, Cosmos Machinery (Holdings) Ltd, with respect to a possible acquisition of assets by the company," it said in a statement.
"The discussions are still at a preliminary stage and no terms have been agreed and no binding commitment has been entered into," it added. No further details were given.
The statement was released at the request of the Hong Kong Stock Exchange. Trading of Cosmos Machinery Enterprises shares was suspended on Friday and had yet to trade on Tuesday.
The stock last traded at HK$1.00.
Cosmos Machinery (Holdings) held about 62.35 percent of the company as of September 1996.
